name: Sexual Violence – UNICEF (2017)
title: Sexual Violence – UNICEF (2017)
description: The source notes that in some instances observations differ from the standard definition or refer to only part of a country.

sources.name: Sexual Violence - UNICEF Global Databases (2017)
sources.dataPublishedBy: UNICEF; Data and Analytics Section; Division of Data, Research and Policy
sources.dataPublisherSource: DHS, MICS and other nationally representative surveys.
sources.additionalInfo: The source notes that in some instances observations differ from the standard definition or refer to only part of a country.

fields.name: Sexual violence prevalence among girls (15 to 19) (UNICEF Global Databases (2014))
fields.description: Percentage of girls aged 15 to 19 years who ever experienced forced sexual intercourse or any other forced sexual acts (including in childhood).

fields.name: Prevalence of forced sex among boys
fields.description: Percentage of men aged 18 to 29 years who experienced forced sex before the age of 18

fields.name: Prevalence of forced sex among girls
fields.description: Percentage of women aged 18 to 29 years who experienced forced sex before the age of 18
